name: Festival Findings
description:
It's post-music festival chaos, and you find yourself with a large pile of lost items. Find clues in a photo of the event to match items with their owners.

Made for Global Game Jam 2021 with the theme: "Lost and Found".

Team

  • Richard Bolland
  • Jonathan Hau-Yoon
  • Dustin van Wyk
  • Hazel Richmond
  • Simon van Wyk
